title: Augusta County: William B. Gallaher to E. C. Gallaher, May 15, 1861
summary: William B. Gallaher describes his satisfaction with camp life and his anticipation of troop movement. He cautions his mother to "keep a sharp look out" on the farm yard and stable.
keywords: This letter was transcribed from another transcribed copy. William B. Gallaher's mother's name was taken from the 1860 population census.
